pr_title: Enable injection of GitHub and other values into mapping

timeline.message: Add ability to inject other local bindings
Move GHGist from late binding to inject bind

timeline.bodyText: owner is alway interned during construction now.
timeline.author: bitwiseman

timeline.bodyText: Actions that were being done after instantiation are now done in the constructor, allowing for those values to be final.
timeline.author: bitwiseman
